name: Insect Infestation - Ludum Dare 46
description:
Protect your back yard from bugs!  Control your electric lawn mower and run over the insects as they try to destroy your shed and mower.

Bugs that get into your shed or jump on the back of your mower will cause damage.  Mower health is reset every 5 waves.

Use WASD, arrows, or GamePad joystick to control your mower.

How any waves can you survive?

This game was developed for Ludum Dare 46.
